JOB DESCRIPTION: Job Description    Summary - A minimum 2-4 years of testing experience. Utilizing Microsoft ALM solution (MTM, Visual Studio, C#, TFS)  - Can understand methods of existing Microsoft ALM solution (MTM, Visual Studio, C#, TFS) framework for automated testing.  - Possesses basic knowledge of software quality concepts within the software development lifecycle.       Job Description    Experience   - 2-4 years (with minimum 1 years experience in Automation)   Educational Qualification   - BE/BTech/MCA or comparable demonstrated work experience      Key Skills :     1+ years of Test Automation experience preferably using C# as scripting language.   Experience in Web automation testing using Selenium Web Driver.   Execute functional, integration and E2E test cases to validate business, system and operational requirements.   Hands-on experience with the Microsoft ALM solution (MTM, Visual Studio, MS Test, C#, TFS, Azure DevOps.   Good knowledge of SQL and ability to write complex queries.   Experience in testing Web Service API (REST/SOAP) through automation. Preferably using SOAP UI or Postman.   Experience in writing good quality bug reports.   Good verbal and written communications skills.   Strong Troubleshooting skills for reaching to root cause of reported issues.
